name: Ruby's Adventure (My first game)
description: This is my first ever 2D RPG game I made on Unity, the player has to communicate with a frog and they have to click X for the dialogue to appear and the frog will be asking you to fix the robots by throwing these magical cogs to towards them by clicking C and they will be fixed, there are 5 health bars to collect if you take damage and 2 are hidden like Easter Eggs, there are weird reactions when you try to throw the cogs or try to access the dialogue.
